# Events: Forms

The \_\_\_\_\_\_ event fires when a form is submitted.

> **Source/s:** [Video: Forms](https://learning.flatironschool.com/courses/3297/pages/video-forms?module_item_id=270739)

## Correct

submit

## Correct

Submit

## Correct

'submit'

## Correct

"submit"
